name: Battlefish: Free Zombie Games
storyline:
An unknown virus has caused sea animals to become stupid zombies and monsters. Now, the stupid fish zombies rage across the world! It's up to you to lead and defend! Rise up against fish zombies, conquer or perish trying! Plan, battle fish, and defend the world from horde of fish zombies! No battlefish was ever won according to plan, but no battlefish was ever won without one! Everything is about planning and strategy!

Look alive! The evil and stupidly cute zombies are shuffling in your direction, and they're hungry for brains! Install Battlefish zombie games – funniest zombie games-- there's no better way to prepare for the zombie apocalypse!
summary:
A tower defense zombie games with shooting elements set between the battle between man vs fish zombies. Battlefish features stupidly cute fish zombies, baby fish zombies, sea monsters, clan fish, Hercules fish, jelly fish, dragon fish, baby sea monsters, fish giants, strategy, and chaos.

In the Battlefish free zombie games no WiFi needed at all. But, for extra features like battling other players for valuable resources you need to join the Clan Fish! Engage in, enjoy, and rule the zombie games online too in Clan Fish section!
